amendment.description: Amendment inserts language clarifying that grants addressing treatment alternatives to incarceration may include a focus on parents whose incarceration could result in their children entering foster care.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Danny amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Davis, Danny.
